review_data.title: End of the tour.
review_data.content: Last night of a choral tour of central Europe. Helma's Purple Rain hit the spot! Wonderful tunes and drinks before AND after dinner.

review_data.title: Best Gin Bar in the Citt
review_data.content: This bar has an impressive amount of gins, specially from Switzerland! They also have many different tonic waters to combine them as well as a big variety of garnishments. The most amazing thing is the team though! They're knowledge on the Gins and their best...More

review_data.title: Nice place for cocktails
review_data.content: This was a nice choice for drinks before dinner. Atmosphere was quiet and upscale. Drinks were good and service was excellent. Soft music, comfortable seating and classical ambience fit perfectly with our evening.

review_data.title: Die besten Cocktails in der Stadt!
review_data.content: Selbstverständlich ist die Auswahl an Swiss Gin und den dazu passenden Tonics unerreicht in Zürich, aber fast noch besser sind...More

review_data.title: Nice Bar
review_data.content: As it is called in German: small but fine. A bar with a lot of choice and nice staff. The prices are normal for Zurich and not exaggerated.More

review_data.title: Great bar with stunning drinks!
review_data.content: We always enjoy to end the day at the Oak Bar. The drink menu is huge - but it can be adjusted to your individual taste. Just ask the wonderful hostess and legendary bartender Helma. We enjoyed the Swiss tapas and the atmosphere very much....More

review_data.title: Remodel, but still a classic
review_data.content: Great new Swiss Tapas menu too! Worth checking out if you haven't been there recently. Greg C., Reno, NV - USAMore

review_data.title: Urlaub
review_data.content: Sehr gute "Schweizer Tapas" gegessen, sehr feundlicher und kompetenter Service. Restaurant mit regionalem Produktangebot, Preis- /Leistungsverhältnis super. Sehr zu empfehlen....More

review_data.title: Nice bar, intimate
review_data.content: Great for after dinner drinks, went twice, once outside. Minor note, floor outside was really dirty with crackers, etc.More
